body_html: Have you taken a look into cuda_configure.bzl. We've got a lot of code for configuring cuda in our build process. I'm not familiar with ROCm but if it's AMD's version of CUDA, we'd love to support it, but I must warn you that it would most likely be a highly nontrivial undertaking.

body: Have you taken a look into [cuda_configure.bzl](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl). We've got a lot of code for configuring cuda in our build process. I'm not familiar with ROCm but if it's AMD's version of CUDA, we'd love to support it, but I must warn you that it would most likely be a highly nontrivial undertaking.
